Fun with NAS

January 20, 2024

  1. Open source NAS? https://www.synology.com/en-global/support/developer https://archive.synology.com/download

  2. recomendation rate configuration home nas SHR vs RAID

  • What is RAID? https://www.macworld.com/article/226891/hardware-raid-what-you-need-to-know.html

SHR:

  • more flexible
  • synology specific
  • ** For now, will probably redo with open source (zfs, true NAS files system )

RAID:

  • “good for drive redundancy, and if you need actual 100% uninterrupted uptime”

How to organize storage pools NAS?
